name: Aurora: Red Rabbit Prototype
description:
Aurora: Hunt for the Red Rabbit is a third-person adventure game that combines casual exploration with tactical interactions and puzzle-solving. Players take control of Aurora, a feisty pug, as she fights to survive in the wilderness while reclaiming what is rightfully hers. Will she return home a hero or forever be lost in darkness?

Check out frankiesketch.wixsite.com/aurora to leave feedback and stay up to date on the Full Game Release!

All Donations go directly into the final game development!
